named-query.name: findByResource
named-query.query: select assignment from ResourceTypeAssignment assignment left join assignment.resource resource where resource.id=:resourceId and assignment.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findResourceByType
named-query.query: select assignment from ResourceTypeAssignment assignment join assignment.resourceType resourceType where resourceType.id=:resourceTypeId and assignment.abolishDate>:abolishDate
